gwt.g3d.client.camera
Class AbstractCamera

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g3d.client.camera.AbstractCamera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Camera
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicCamera
public class AbstractCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements Camera

An abstract implementation of the Camera interface in 3D space.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

setEyeOffset

public void setEyeOffset(Tuple3f offset)
Sets the offset of the eye from the target. This will override the current eye position, and should only be called after target is set.
